dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: A dataset comprising 100 categories, with training and validation sets containing 50k and 10k images, respectively, used for evaluating knowledge transfer between different model architectures.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-100

dcterms:creator: Yash Goyal
Tejas Khot
Douglas Summers-Stay
Dhruv Batra
Devi Parikh
dcterms:description: A dataset for Visual Question Answering, used to evaluate the effectiveness of knowledge transfer between visual and textual modalities.
dcterms:title: VQA v2.0

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of common objects in context, used for evaluating knowledge transfer in image-text retrieval tasks.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO

dcterms:creator: Pranav Rajpurkar
Robin Jia
Percy Liang
dcterms:description: A dataset for question answering that includes unanswerable questions, used to evaluate knowledge transfer between classification and question answering tasks.
dcterms:title: SQuAD v2.0

dcterms:creator: Andrew Maas
Raymond E Daly
Peter T Pham

dcterms:description: A dataset for sentiment analysis, used to evaluate knowledge transfer between different tasks such as classification and question answering.
dcterms:title: IMDb
